Class.Name: InputNode
Class.Description: Handle processed input events found in input binding assets

Out.Name: Pressed
Out.Description: Signaled when the input event begins.

Out.Name: Held
Out.Description: Signaled while the input event is active.

Out.Name: Released
Out.Description: Signaled when the input event ends.

Property.Name: Event Name
Property.Description: The input event name as defined in an inputbinding asset. Example 'Fireball'

Property.Name: Value
Property.Description: The current value from the input.
